apps.name: Capcorn Guest Registration
apps.title: Capcorn Guest Registration
apps.subtitle: Use the FRIVA Guest Registration integration to automatically transfer your guest data to Capcorn.
apps.about: About Capcorn Guest Registration We know only too well that bureaucratic work often takes up valuable time. When you enter your guests' data, this is first done in the hotel programme and then again in the registration programme. This doesn't have to be the case, because FRIVA Guest Registration can take care of this double data entry for you. With our solution, we have created a way to automatically extract the registration data from the hotel programme and transfer it to the registration programme of your municipality. Quick and uncomplicated. After successful transfer, you can conveniently print the registration form for your guests and create guest cards. Whether in print form or as a digital solution - FRIVA Guest Registration supports both functions (*depending on the registration programme and its functions). Time saving No more double data entry! Reduce your daily administrative tasks, invest the time you save and take care of the essential task of a hotelier - being a host. Automation You do not need to log in or carry out updates. With FRIVA guest registration, you use our fully automated service, which transfers your guest data from your PMS to the municipality programme. Quick and easy activation The connection of your hotel can be activated and enabled at any time for the integrations we have already developed. We will be happy to support you in querying the configuration data. Security & data protection Your registration-relevant guest data will be treated confidentially and in accordance with the GDPR guidelines. The data processing takes place exclusively in a member state of the EU.

apps.subtitle: Simple housekeeping and task management
apps.about:
About Sweeply + Traces Simple Housekeeping and Task Management for hospitality. Sweeply saves costs, increases guest satisfaction and sustainability by improving housekeeping, maintenance and guest requests communication. Our solution transforms complex housekeeping operations into seamless, automated workflows—helping hotels improve efficiency while keeping a human-first approach to staff well-being and guest service. We work with all type of hospitality businesses - from SMB to Mid-Market, and Entreprise. For General Managers & Operations Managers:
*Cut Costs & Reduce Errors
*Solve Staff Shortages
*Boost Efficiency & Guest Experience
*Digitise Manual Processes For Housekeeping Managers & Supervisors:
*Make Work Easier & Reduce Stress
*Bridge Language Barriers
*Enhance Job Satisfaction
*Support, Not Replace Simplicity Easy-to-Use, Multilingual Platform – Built to support diverse teams with language-friendly technology. Save Time Automate repetitive tasks while keeping full control over your whole property including all your areas (not just the rooms). Enhance Collaboration & Guest Experience A connected team means fewer mistakes and improved service quality which overall supports a better Work Environment. Go Paperless & Sustainable Digitalise SOPs, eliminate manual paperwork, and boost efficiency.

apps.name: Roomgrid
apps.title: Roomgrid
apps.subtitle: Gain control over your vacancy reporting & maintenance — on any device without installation
apps.about: About Roomgrid Roomgrid helps you regain control over your housekeeping and maintenance operations. With its role-based focus, Roomgrid adapts to your employees' needs, making it simpler and more efficient than ever to satisfy your guests with rooms in perfect shape. The web-based app allows employees to log in easily via QR code from their desktop, tablet or smartphone without prior installation. Gain total control over cleaning processes See the cleaning status of each room in real-time, let cleaners and checkers update rooms with one tap, and automatically assign your cleaners und checkers to all your dirty rooms. Keep track of maintenance requirements Let your team report defects as soon as they spot them. Assign defects to maintenance staff and track their progress. Gain valuable insights through reports Who cleaned which room and when? How many rooms needed a second cleaning? Export reports as Excel sheets, so that never need to argue with external providers again. Green Choice Save money and protect the environment by letting guests cancel cleanings via their smartphone

integration_features.name: Live-sync with apaleo
integration_features.description: The app receives and updates live room status information and automatically calculates which rooms need to be cleaned as staying, leaving or longstay room based on booking information.

integration_features.name: Detect longstay rooms
integration_features.description: Set custom cleaning intervals for longstay rooms, which Roomgrid recognizes either by booking duration or the rate plans stored in apaleo.

integration_features.name: Know when bedsheets need to be changed
integration_features.description: Based on the booking information from apaleo, Roomgrid automatically displays when bedsheets need to be changed for any room.

apps.name: Lula.Cleaning
apps.title: Lula.Cleaning
apps.subtitle: Lula.Cleaning App - The ultimate tool for streamlining your cleaning and management processes.
apps.about:
About Lula.Cleaning The app simplifies communication between property managers and cleaning teams, eliminating errors and saving you time, all while ensuring the highest quality service. Our app continuously reads bookings from integrated platforms, keeping everyone on your team updated!
Additionally, you can easily monitor malfunctions, keep track of settlements, and receive real-time updates on the status of your property. Say goodbye to the hassle of juggling multiple communicators, spreadsheets, and to-do lists. Keep all the most important booking information in one place and manage them conveniently with one click! Get access to reports of completed tasks, salaries, and damage reports as well as day-by-day view of reservations. Synchronize your calendars easily and in many languages. Switch to a specialized solution for management from one centralized location, with automatic translations, full history, and high accountability. The app does not include a marketplace feature and is not intended for finding external cleaning companies or staff. ---> Key features list: Simple manual or automatic cleaning task assignments Cleaning tasks may be scheduled to own team or outsourced to an external cleaning company Constant synchronization of booking calendars from different systems Damages reporting with their repair flow Communication between housekeeping teams and managers/hosts with automatic translations of messages Laundry items Automation rules for example adding a towel change task every 3 days for stays longer than 4 days Cleaning inspection Define your own types of cleanings Instant notifications available through different channels (push, email, in-app) Keeps track of settlements and cleaning prices with employees and contractors Different settlement rates Photo gallery (before or after cleaning, periodic inspection, guidelines). Uploaded pictures may be shared publicly with guests or apartment owners Checklists assigned to properties or cleanings Different u

integration_features.name: Simple manual or automatic cleaning task assignments
integration_features.description:
Lula.Cleaning allows you to assign cleaning tasks with just one simple click - in a matter of seconds! The cleaning person will get notified about the new task right away!
You may also assign a person/couple of people to a chosen property and have the tasks assigned to them automatically.

integration_features.name: Cleaning tasks scheduled to own team or external company
integration_features.description:
Streamline your maintenance processes by adding as many housekeepers to one reservation as you need.

The operation of your property may be outsourced to an external company. They will take care of assigning cleaning tasks to the right housekeepers from their company.

integration_features.name: Reports - damages, settlements, laundry items
integration_features.description: Reports are intelligently organized to provide a clear overview of activities with salary-related information. Whether you need to track the performance of specific cleaning personnel or assess the efficiency of property managers, the reports offer full transparency.

key_benefits.name: Saves time and reduces operational costs
key_benefits.description: Minimize losses from missed cleanings and incorrect maintenance reports, while improving guest satisfaction. Everything is integrated into one efficient solution.

key_benefits.name: Quality assurance - checklists and pictures
key_benefits.description: Ensure high quality by using checklists and guideline pictures with photo time stamps (taking and uploading), be immediately notified of issues, and always be certain that everything is ready on time.

key_benefits.name: Higher team accountability
key_benefits.description: Monitor your team's progress in real-time and receive notifications. Lula is available in 23 languages, with the interface and messages automatically translated – no more miscommunications!

key_benefits.name: Replaces many tools (calendars, messengers)
key_benefits.description: Switch to using a centralized, convenient solution to manage cleaning and maintenance processes seamlessly. Move away from multiple communicators and prevent miscommunications and lost information.

apps.name: BlueID
apps.title: BlueID
apps.subtitle: A cloud-based access control solution with digital keys thought for truly digital buildings.
apps.about: About BlueID BlueID ACCESS® - a cloud-based key system that works with smartphones and NFC cards - streamlines your hotel processes, enables 24/7 self-check-in, and ultimately, reduces your costs. We provide you premium locks, uncomplicated tools for in-house maintenance, and state-of-art security algorithms that withstand cybersecurity attacks. To start, you can choose the right locks from our broad hardware catalogue according to your design and installation needs. Our locks are offline , which makes retrofitting your existing doors noticeably cost-efficient. Our guest app is customizable with your hotel design . With the existing integration with apaleo, our access control can seamlessly complement your hotel ecosystem . We offer an uncomplicated lock virtualization and management for your reception staff and the possibility of 24/7 self check-in for your guests . On top of that, we enable in-house maintenance of our smart locks with a dedicated smartphone app, so that you save money on expensive maintenance contracts. We offer the right key system for existing and new hotels, which need an access control solution that supports your daily processes and enables a truly digital guest journey. Find out more on our website. We are already implemented in the Apaleo ecosystem - get started now! Guest App customization Our app is customizable to complement your hotel identity Cost-efficiency Our locks work offline and can be installed in fire protection doors without losing the certification, which makes retrofitting your existing doors very cost-efficient and simple.

apps.subtitle: Simplify Owner Management - create owner invoices, statements, booking reports and collect payments.
apps.about: About Owner Center A complete Owner Management tool with customizable features and automation capabilities, allowing you to create owner invoices, statements, booking reports and collect payments. Owner Center stands out as a robust platform that provides property managers and owners with powerful tools for streamlined communication and financial management. Revenue Recognition Owner Center introduces a revenue recognition method that allows you to choose the date from which revenue is calculated on statements or invoices, helping you align your financial reporting. Automatic Statements & Invoices This feature automates the creation and delivery of owner statements and invoices at intervals of your choice (Weekly, Bi-Weekly, Monthly, or Yearly). You can also include canceled bookings & expenses Profit & Loss Report Addressing high demand, Owner Center includes a Profit & Loss report that enables you to access, filter, and download data related to total revenue, expenses, and net revenue on a monthly basis.

integration_features.description: This feature provides the ability for creation & delivery of owner statements and invoices at intervals of your choice (Weekly, Bi-Weekly, Monthly, or Yearly) by selecting automatic option. You can also include canceled bookings and expenses in these documents.

integration_features.name: Custom Payout Rules
integration_features.description: Property managers have the flexibility to set custom payout rules, ensuring that owners receive payments according to their unique financial agreements.

integration_features.name: Customized Privileges

apps.about: About Faundit Automating the headaches of Lost and found, Faundit increases operational efficiency and guest experience for 500+ hotels in 20+ countries. apps.name: MAIC OS

apps.subtitle: MAIC as a workflow and Guest engagement System tailor made for the Hospitality industry.
apps.about: About MAIC OS MAIC's Workflow Optimization employs a cutting-edge closed-loop system, ensuring the swift allocation of guest requests to the appropriate department, thus enhancing the efficiency of hotel operations from start to finish. This system not only streamlines service delivery but also significantly reduces costs. Our advanced modules enhance guest interaction by providing early access to hotel services, from spa bookings to restaurant reservations, with a simple two-click system. The check-in/out process is expedited, and our restaurant service solution offers guests the autonomy to order and pay, leading to a streamlined, paperless operation. Similarly, spa management is simplified, allowing for easy appointment setting. Adopting MAIC in a 200-room resort, complete with dining, spa, events, and rentals, improves service quality with fewer staff. The system's efficiency doubles the return on investment and can increase service sales by up to 20%. MAIC's implementation results in significant labor cost savings depending on the modules employed, directly benefiting the bottom line, as labor is a major expense in hotel operations. Embrace MAIC for peak hospitality performance Operations Streamline your operations with automated request management, routine tasks, preventive maintenance, housekeeping, spa reservations, and table management. Enjoy team communication on any language Guest Engagement Enhance guest engagement with a personalized  pre-stay email, offering one-click access to a personal digital concierge—streamlining service bookings for an exceptional stay.

apps.subtitle: Create the guest cards, there is no need to transfer the data to the AVS registration form system.
apps.about: About AVS Meldeschein Does your municipality use the AVS registration form (AVS-Meldeschein) system? Then this app will save your employees hundreds of hours of work when filling out the guest cards or manually transferring CSV files. You can create the guest cards for your municipality directly in Apaleo with one click. Now there is no need to transfer the data to the AVS registration form system. Or even filling out the forms by hand. With one click the guest data will be transferred to the system of the municipality and the guest card will be printed directly on the local printer. The correct fee for the guest card will be taken directly from the municipality and transferred to the folio. In case you have no reception, the guest data can be transmitted automatically as soon as the guest checks-in. Before you can start submitting registration forms we do need the "Konfigurationsübersicht" from your municipality. Please sent it to avs@vukee.com This app is provided by vukee GmbH & Co. KG. Save time Transfer guest data with a click to your municipality. Error free Be sure to be always compliant with the local requirements of your municipality.

apps.about: About hotelkit hotelkit is a Hotel Operations Platform that enables hotels to better connect their teams, improve internal communication and fully digitalize and simplify daily workflows! The solution is already used by 100,000 hotel employees across more than 2,500 hotels worldwide. hotelkit´s solution for collaboration & service optimization makes handovers smoother, communication simpler, and guests happier. With hotelkit housekeeping, hotels benefit from digitalized processes, seamless interfaces to PMS, and real-time updates of the room status. With the help of Handovers and News, everyone can be quickly informed about changes and internal communication runs smoothly. Checklists and a Handbook enable consistent and comprehensive compliance with strict hygiene requirements. Digital repair orders and guest requests additionally facilitate collaboration. Delivering outstanding service has never been easier and now hoteliers can spend more time doing what they do best: making their guests happy. Optimized communication With the help of the communication tools, information can be conveyed transparently and in a targeted manner, – and made accessible to all via PC, tablet, or smartphone – regardless of location. Improved productivity The possibility to prioritize tasks enables employees to maintain an efficient overview and always stay on top of things. Accelerated workflows Daily workflows and recurring checklists can be digitally created and automatically assigned to employees. The digital collaboration platform allows you to track work progress in real time. Connected teams Special moments occurring both inside and outside the daily work routine can be shared with the entire team across their very own social stream and chat.

apps.about: About myTraces by detco In a hectic day to day business its sometimes easy to forget the small but important details. myTraces, makes it easy for you to keep track of all the little tasks that go into running your hotel and  guarantee a smooth and pleasent stay for your guests! With myTRACES you can view relevant traces centrally or at reservation level, allowing you to have a great overview on which traces are pending in the immediate future. The allocation of roles gives you the possibility to escalate tasks in time and guarantee a smooth and pleasent stay for your guests. Creating traces will become routine with myTraces. Due to the ability to create templates, the most important traces can be created within minutes. For reoccuring traces it is even enough to create a trace once. apps.about: About char pmslink keycard char pmslink keycard is a universal connector that allows the registration and management of Guest Key Cards & Mobile Access. using the Apaleo PMS interface It is compatible with different key system providers: ASSA ABLOY - VingCard DORMAKABA - Ambiance SALTO ONITY TESA OMNITEC and more and allows the use of compatible card encoders and printers. The Hotel is able to: Record a keycard in two-steps, allowing additional options for each specific case. Additionally allow access from the guest's mobile terminal through the Key System Provider's app. Easy key card recording A User Interface is displayed within the PMS itself (iframe) with options related to the reservation, occupants, additional accesses and particularities of the electronic locking system. Use of any encoder, dispenser and printer pmslink keycard will route the process to the desired encoder by adjusting the connections, options and procedures to be performed transparently to the PMS and the electronic locking system. Mobile Keys for guests Mobile Keys are available for guests whether they use the locking system's APP or the hotel's guest APP. Possibility of complex architectures pmslink is a universal connector that adapts to any type of architecture, solving complex groupings and routing, in any distribution required.

apps.subtitle: Dialock is an advanced identification and locking system which meets the highest security standards.
apps.about: About Häfele - DIALOCK Häfele Dialock – Electronic locking system. Dialock is an advanced identification and locking system which meets the most stringent of security standards, designed and engineered by Häfele. Häfele is an internationally positioned corporate group with headquarter in Nagold, Germany. The family-owned company was founded in 1923 and is offering electronic locking systems and LED light as well as furniture and construction fittings to the hotel industry worldwide. Your advantages: Dialock operates by contactless wear-free technology, the very latest system operates via a customer’s mobile phone. You have the ability to assign different access rights with optional access levels and time-restricted admittance. The system has centrally managed authorisation through hardware and software programming. No need to expensive cylinder and key changes if keys are lost. Häfele Dialock – Zutrittsmanagement weiter gedacht. Das elektronische Schließsystem Häfele Dialock steht für intelligentes Zutrittsmanagement – vernetzt, berührungslos und zuverlässig. Die Anwendungsbereiche sind schier unbegrenzt. Ob in Hotel, Industrie, Klinik oder zu Hause: Jede erdenkliche Tür, Klappe, Schublade oder auch jeder Rollladen lässt sich nach aktuellen Standards sichern – und das berührungslos und wartungsfrei durch modernste Transpondertechnik. Über Häfele Häfele ist eine international aufgestellte Unternehmensgruppe mit Hauptsitz in Nagold, Deutschland. Das Familienunternehmen wurde 1923 gegründet und bedient heute die Hotellerie weltweit mit elektronischen Schließsystemen und LED-Licht sowie Möbel- und Baubeschlägen. Ihre Vorteile: Hohe Zuverlässigkeit und Wirtschaftlichkeit Modulares, beliebig erweiterbares System Anbindung an Online-, Fremd- und Zeiterfassungssysteme möglich Breite Palette an Basissystemen, aber auch individuelle Sonderlösungen – einschließlich der Anbindung an die bestehende Infrastruktur Rundum-Service für Planung, Einbau, Inbetriebnahme und Schulung Pro

apps.subtitle: Export for the Swiss Statistic Office (HESTA) and the hotel control of the Zurich Canton Police
apps.about: About BedayaConnect Bedaya Connect is a middleware that supports customers to connect apaleo with several systems. Currently, we offer two standard exports: Swiss Federal Statistic Office: This export is for Swiss customers that need to send their hotel statistics to the Swiss Federal Statistic Office every month. Bedaya automates this process. The price is 10 CHF/EUR per month and property. Hotel Control Zurich: The data of all guests that are in-house at the current day are sent to the Zurich Cantonal Police (Hotelkontrolle). The price is 50CHF/EUR per month and property if the upload is done by a Bedaya Cloud PC. If you use your own PC the price is 25 CHF/EUR per month and property. If you need a connection to a system that we don't support yet contact our support at support@bedaya.ch. We will evaluate together how we can integrate your system with Apaleo. Win time No manual export Comply with legal requirements No workarounds, you are compliant in seconds

apps.name: Profiles
apps.title: Profiles
apps.subtitle: Say hello to the app that simplifies and enhances your guest profile management.
apps.about: About Profiles Profiles by Simultem was designed to ease the challenge of managing guest information by providing an all-in-one guest management solution with intelligent automation. We’ve gathered insights, pain points, and feature requests directly from hoteliers to create a tool that simplifies daily operations, enhances guest interactions, and ensures data accuracy. With Profiles by Simultem, hotel staff can quickly access and manage guest profiles, merge duplicate records effortlessly, and gain valuable insights with AI-generated summaries. Built with multiple essential functions in one platform, it eliminates time-consuming manual work and helps hotels deliver seamless, personalized experiences. We provide solutions for these issues: Guest information scattered across systems Hard to track returning customers & booking history Inability to merge duplicate profiles Difficulty in making a reservation for an existing profile Reducing Errors Caused by Duplicate Profiles By merging duplicate profiles and ensuring accurate, up-to-date guest data, hoteliers can provide more personalized service, boosting guest satisfaction and loyalty. Save Time with Centralized Guest Profiles The ease of access allows staff to personalize guest interactions more effectively, improving overall guest experiences and fostering positive reviews and repeat visits. Smarter Decisions & Better Guest Experiences By keeping guest data clean and accurate, hotels can personalize interactions, recognize loyal guests, and target promotions more effectively, improving marketing efforts. Streamline Reservation with "Book Now" Plugin This integration increases efficiency, reduces the chance of errors, and speeds up the booking process, which can boost conversion rates and enhance customer satisfaction.

integration_features.name: Effortless Profile Merging

About LoungeUp by D-EDGE LoungeUp by D-EDGE is the all-in-one platform for guest relationship and hotel operations management, used by more than 3000 tourist accommodation providers from 3-star to luxury hotels, as well as hotel groups and chains. The company has merged with D-EDGE in 2024, the European No1 and World No3 hotel distribution technology provider in hospitality, supporting 17,000 hotels in 150 countries. Key features of LoungeUp platform: CRM and marketing newsletters segmentation Online check-in/out Keyless entry Contactless experience Upgrade and payment Guest messaging Personalisation automation Staff tasks management Internal communication LoungeUp aims to streamline and personalise the guest experience whilst simplifying operational work and increasing the establishment’s revenue. apps.about: About MARA AI Review Assistant Responding to online reviews can be a daunting task, but it doesn't have to be with our AI Review Assistant of MARA. Our tool is designed to ease your Online Reputation Management process, making it more efficient, personalized, and time-saving. It offers the best and most personalized AI for responding to and analyzing your guest reviews. Here are some key features: The most personal AI for review responses that adapts to your language Review Inbox with collected reviews from all your review sources. Replying becomes as easy as hitting "Generate reply" > "Send" > "Done". Truly personalized and actionable analytics, as individual as each hotel Response automation (e.g. automatic responses to 5-star reviews without text from Google) Improve your overall rating MARA helps you efficiently increase your ratings on platforms like Google, Booking, Tripadvisor etc. to enhance your online reputation and increase your hotels visibility. Boost your response rates MARA customers achieve 100% response rates with ease because our AI understands your language and knows your hotel. This means you only need to approve replies and publish them from the Review Inbox. Save time and money We want to help you focus on what really matters - spending time with your guests to create an exceptional guest experience. MARA helps you save plenty of hours each week managing your reviews.

apps.about: About fanz How do we support you? At fanz, we are on a mission to connect companies with new and existing customers in a powerful way. We are building amazing, easy to use, value-added services on top of the existing digital payment infrastructure that both businesses and customers love. Once you combine smart ways of accepting digital payments with loyalty rules, review automation, direct messaging, smart referrals, loyalty ad networks, smart tipping, machine learning and more, we can rethink the way businesses transact, interact and connect with new and existing customers. Convenient and fast payments integrated into apaleo Enable QR code payments at Point-Of-Sale or send payment links via SMS/email Multi-channel payment via Ecommerce as well – one solution for getting paid via your website, acquiring new customers and retaining them Guests can conveniently pay with their mobile phones using their favorite payment providers like Google Pay, Apple Pay, Visa, MasterCard, Amex, etc.! Fast, secure and PSD2 compliant No hardware terminals, no maintenance, no touch at Point-Of-Sale Brings offline payments online with seamless integrations from the apaleo dashboard Powerful state-of-the-art CRM / Loyalty included without the need for additional cost intensive software Turn payments into a marketing machine After payment, up to 80% of all customers participate in collecting cashback, 10x more than industry standard! No data silos, no sign-ups, no cards, no apps, no complex redemption and integrations. Fanz makes it convenient and beneficial for customers to spend more money with a business or group of businesses. We match collected cashback to the customer’s mobile number and send text messages with a 100x higher response rate than traditional marketing. Powerful merchant backend You can define your own loyalty rules such as % of cashback, frequency and time frame. Access to transactions and customer data in real time. Detailed reporting on each payment, redeemed cashback

Seamlessly effective and user-friendly, this CRM harnesses the power of data to offer a comprehensive understanding of your guests. With a visual and clear mapping of the guest journey, you will know what is being sent at every stage of and on each channel -not just email. apps.about: About Customer Alliance Customer Alliance makes it easy to capture, understand, share and act on feedback. We’ve built a powerful Software-as-a-Service platform that makes it easy to capture, understand, share and act on feedback. apps.about: About Maileon Hoteliers can reap significant benefits by utilizing our app that connects Apaleo, a comprehensive hotel management platform, with Maileon, a robust email marketing software. Here are the advantages hoteliers can expect: Seamless Customer Communication: With the Apaleo-Maileon integration, hoteliers can effortlessly sync their contacts and bookings to Maileon's email marketing software. This enables hoteliers to establish direct and effective communication channels with guests before, during, and after their stay. Personalized messages, such as booking confirmations, pre-arrival welcome emails, post-stay feedback requests, and exclusive offers, can be sent automatically, enhancing the overall guest experience. Targeted Marketing Campaigns: By harnessing Maileon's advanced segmentation capabilities, hoteliers can precisely target specific guest segments based on their preferences, booking history, or demographics. This empowers hoteliers to create highly tailored marketing campaigns, such as personalized upselling offers, loyalty program promotions, or special event notifications. The result is improved engagement, higher conversion rates, and increased revenue. Customer Retention and Loyalty: With the ability to sync bookings and guest data, hoteliers can leverage Maileon's automation features to nurture guest relationships throughout the customer journey. Automated email workflows can be set up to engage guests before their arrival, request feedback after check-out, and provide personalized recommendations for future stays. By delivering relevant and timely messages, hoteliers can enhance guest satisfaction, foster loyalty, and increase the likelihood of repeat bookings. Streamlined Operations: The seamless synchronization of contacts and bookings between Apaleo and Maileon eliminates the need for manual data entry and reduces the risk of errors. apps.about:
About dailypoint™ dailypoint™ - Software made by Toedt, Dr. Selk & Coll. GmbH dailypoint™ is the leading Data Management and CRM platform for individual hotels & hotel groups. dailypoint™ collects data from all relevant sources such as PMS, POS, website, newsletter or Wi-Fi and creates a central and consolidated guest profile. Central Profile - the Golden Record:
It's always been a hotelier's dream to know the habits, likes and dislikes of their guests. We help you make your guests smile. Data Laundry:
The dailypoint™ Data Laundry is one of the key functionalities and a prerequisite for consolidating data from different systems to create a central profile. Profile Engine:
Learn WHO your Customers are – like a data professional! With the Profile Engine within dailypoint™ you get a full picture of each customer using the thousands of micro-moments happening every day and coming from the different touchpoints consolidated in dailypoint™. Campaign Management:
With dailypoint™ your marketing is not only streamlined, in many cases automated and highly personalized, your marketing is also measurable. Voucher System:
No matter if you want to make prospective customers book or get additional bookings from your existing guests, 360° by dailypoint™ offers an integrated Voucher System – a great tool for your cross and upselling and to enhance your direct booking strategy. Online Reputation Management:
The dailypoint™ Questionnaire System combines a complete Online Reputation Management (ORM) tool with a professional form builder. Everything is responsive and can be adapted to your corporate design. Analytics:
A wide range of pre-defined guest and data quality reports help you to read and interpret your data properly. Whether it is an analysis of the questionnaire results, the results of your marketing campaigns, the value of your customer segments or the quality of your data. Loyalty Program:
dailypoint™ offers a fully integrated and scalable Loyalty Program which can be used b

apps.name: Revinate
apps.title: Revinate
apps.subtitle: The all-in-one CRM and marketing automation solution built for hotels by hoteliers.
apps.about:
Personalize the guest experience with this all-in-one Marketing Automation and hotel data solution built specifically for hotels by hoteliers.

Core features:

- __Hospitality CRM__: Using state-of-the-art technology, Revinate integrates guest data from the Property Management System (PMS) and Surveys, enabling highly effective and targeted campaigns.
- __Smart Guest Segments__: Segmentation is easier than ever with Revinate Marketing’s Smart Segment Builder. To save you time, we’ve preloaded the top segments proven to drive revenue and engagement.
- __Email Marketing Automation__: Revinate Marketing allows you to communicate individually with your guests, wherever they are in their lifecycle, in a fast and efficient way.
- __Upsell emails__: Pre-arrival upsell emails give your guests the opportunity to enhance their stay though room upgrades and amenity add-ons, all while driving profitable revenue to your bottom line.
- __Reporting Intelligence__: Measure performance in real-time with campaign metrics and a transparent revenue attribution model. Compare performance against previous campaigns and other properties in your portfolio.
- __Group Functionality__: Whether you market your hotels from the property or group level, Group Functionality streamlines your efforts, allowing you to work more efficiently and strategically.
- __Hospitality Marketing Strategy__: A team of dedicated industry experts are on-hand to provide strategic support to help you exceed your email marketing goals.

pricing.name: Revinate Hotel CRM & Marketing
pricing.description: Full hotel CRM & marketing automation for hotels.

apps.name: Tripozon Messenger
apps.title: Tripozon Messenger
apps.subtitle: Connect with customers through conversations and use it to increase direct bookings and loyalty.
apps.about:
Tripozon Messenger is an instant messaging application to help hospitality businesses to connect with customers through conversations and use it as a leverage to increase direct bookings, guest satisfaction and loyalty.

Our goal is to meet travellers’ new expectations and bring to the Hoteliers the value of frictionless effortless hospitality experiences. On the one hand, this service guarantees great spontaneity and a privileged relationship to customers. On the other hand, hoteliers will receive business opportunities and will retain their customers. As a result, hotels will save or even start to earn more money from their Direct Bookings and will be able to offer very competitive rates to customers in return.

Your advantages:

- Design Customer Conversation to Drive Engagement

Simplify the end-to-end customer experience with a single conversation. Organize conversations around customers, not internal systems.

- Regain control from competitors

Build a booking, support and loyalty experience customers want to come back to.

Tripozon helps you create a direct line of communication to customers for a more

personal and engaging experience.

- Boost revenue with smoother up-sell opportunities

Consumers are more receptive than ever to personal recommendations. Tripozon allows you to expand revenue by providing unobstructed service and experience recommendations without annoying upselling.

- Drive Customer Loyalty with Personalized service

Rich product cards for bookings and service Seamless human interaction with customers Personalized experience recommendations based on chat history Instantly answer customer questions and concerns

- Own the mobile booking experience

51% of smartphone owners use them for booking online, buying flight tickets and other travel, tourism and leisure related activities. By 2020, there will be 725 million unique subscribers of mobile services. Use Tripozon to provide a seamless booking experience that isn’t just mobile optimized but mobilenative to keep customers coming back for more.

- Meet and exceed millennial expectations

Millennials are the experience generation, seeking events and travel more than simple products. Tripozon-powered messaging lets you offer localized, on-demand booking and service experiences for millennials who expect such convenience.

Tripozon Messenger selling points:

- In-house messaging platform: We have developed our own technology making any evolution flexible and easier. The multi-users option is included.

- In-house Directory: We also created a directory to allow businesses to display their activity and diversify their exposure on the App. The goal is to redirect customers to Hoteliers website to finalize reservations themselves.

pricing.name: All-in-one
pricing.description: Instant Messaging platform to convert conversations into direct bookings as well as a marketplace to grow your exposure.

__• Guest Feedback •__

apps.name: Experience Hotel
apps.title: Experience Hotel
apps.subtitle: Designed to manage guest database, e-reputation, guest experience, and email marketing campaign.
apps.about:
Experience Hotel is a tool that handles your customer relations and ensures the ideal customer experience, from the first reservation until customer loyalty is established.

- Capture: the contact information collected from each customer
- Segment: customer profiles are segmented according to predetermined criteria
- Personalize: a personalized experience for every step of the customer journey
- Publish: customer comments are published on social media
- Build loyalty: automatic email campaigns to build loyalty

__Nonstop support, from reservation to arrival__

Reservation confirmations, welcome emails, pre-stay forms, sale of services, pre-check-in, etc.: a collection of simple tools lets you fully anticipate and response to customers' needs.

A quality customer experience is your top priority. Your customers will notice, and feel that they have made the right choice.

__Forget the Traditional Business/Pleasure Dichotomy.__

Influential social media users, couples celebrating a wedding anniversary, business travelers likely to be interested in a corporate contract, frequent travelers to your city discovering your hotel for the first time, etc.

Over 30 different criteria determine the optimal steps to take to create future revenue specific to each customer profile.

__Simplify Your Check-In__

Whether it's the GDPR or just the police forms for your jurisdiction, our welcome form tablet application allows you to maintain perfect compliance with current laws.

No more paper storage! Everything is computerized.

__4 Steps That are Indispensable to Your E-Reputation__

- Without an email address, there's no way to invite them to write a comment.
- Without continuous monitoring of the quality of their stay, you run the risk of receiving a negative review.
- Without providing exceptional customer experience, it's difficult to receive the kind of scores you need to move up in the ratings.

Experience Hotel puts you in control of the 3 points above so that you can publish comments on social media.

__Never Lose Contact with Your Customers__

For three years, every customer is analyzed to determine which automatic personalized messages s/he will receive from you.

You maintain an elegant relationship with your clients. They understand and remember the advantages of reserving future stays directly, whether for themselves or for loved ones they have spoken to about your hotel.

__Your Former OTA Customers  Retained With No Commission__

Give yourself every opportunity to get your customers to book directly, and inspire their loved ones to discover your hotel, by:

1. collecting email addresses from all your customers.
2. providing an extraordinary experience in your hotel.
3. using data intelligently to manage your automatic emailing campaigns.

pricing.description: All the tools, before, during and after the stay, to provide a personalized experience for every single guest.

pricing.description:
An authentic, fully automated customer loyalty strategy
Manage your communications: Experience will handle everything for you.

apps.name: Hotel-Spider Metasearch
apps.title: Hotel-Spider Metasearch
apps.subtitle: Meta search platforms allow guests to compare hotel offers.
apps.about: About Hotel-Spider Metasearch Meta search platforms allow guests to compare, not just different hotel offers but also a variety of intermediaries for each property. On Trivago and TripAdvisor a traveller can see all the different offers that exist for your property in a central place. This gives you the possibility to position your direct booking option next to the offer from other platforms such as OTA’s. Most Meta Search sites work based on a Pay Per Click (PPC) or Cost Per Click (CPC) price model. You as the official hotel website bid for the positioning on the meta search platform. When a guest clicks on the like he gets taken in to the booking process on your homepage and it will create a cost per click for you with the meta search provider. META SEARCH AND YOUR BOOKING STRATEGY Your website and booking engine are the core of your direct booking strategy. If you can’t generate traffic on your website, even the best conversion rate won’t bring you the results you’re looking for. META search advertisement is one of the tools available to compete for guests’ attention, drive traffic to your website and convert direct guests. Everything needs to work together in order for you to get the return on advertising spend you’re looking for. HOTEL-SPIDER WEB-BOOKING-ENGINE In combination with Spider-Booking, we offer the possibility of connecting to Trivago, TripAdvisor and soon G.........

apps.name: helloTESS! point of sale
apps.title: helloTESS! point of sale
apps.subtitle: helloTESS! is a cloud-based POS system - from family business to international hotel chains
apps.about:
About helloTESS! point of sale helloTESS! is a cloud POS cashier system. In a world changing towards digitalization and changing requirements, the flexibility of a POS is key. With our iPad-based POS, manually installing updates and performing maintenance tasks are over, saving you time and effort and ensuring that you are using the latest software version with bug fixes and security patches without manual work. helloTESS can be easily scaled up or down based on your business needs by offering flexibility in terms of adding or removing locations, features, integrations, or users, which can be adjusted as your business requirements evolve. The POS is certified in various countries e.g. Germany, Austria, Switzerland, UK, France, Spain, The Netherlands, USA...and several others.
With a variety of partners, you are free to add any additional service that fits you best, offering innovative and time-saving features like self-ordering and -payment, table reservations, shift scheduling, inventory control, and many more.
In addition to that, an open API provides an interface that allows you to connect other software keeping your performance at a peak while offering maximum flexibility. The integration to Apaleo allows real-time data flows transferring your POS data into Apaleo while also giving the option to transfer bills to a specific room based on the guest name or room number.
The latest addition in features is the Adyen connection which not only makes it possible to automatically send the amount charged to the Adyen Credit Card terminal but also to integrate to Apaleo Pay. If activated in the terminal, tip request as well as currency charged can be requested on the CC terminal. apps.name: MY SPA
apps.title: MY SPA
apps.subtitle: Comfortable Wellness Planning
apps.about: About MY SPA MY SPA is a wellness planner for your beauty, wellness or sports offers. It enables every employee and external sales partners to make a verified reservation for a treatment whenever your guest asks you for it. From the moment you create a reservation, the guests are introduced in MY SPA. Arrangement components - packages and individual services - are transferred to MY SPA for fulfillment. In this case, they are already booked as fixed services on the guest invoice and are not billed additionally. Stay data, fellow travellers and their guest profiles are imported - with all personal data. The language of the guest determines the language of the customer documents, if translations are provided. So all reservation changes are visible in MY SPA, so that e.g. the room number is always up-to-date. Additionally booked treatments, item sales and gratuities are charged to the guest profile of the traveller or the main folio of the reservation. Guest checks can be generated at the spa desk for the guest to sign. Day Spa guests can be checked in to a Day Spa account, in this case they receive their final bill at the Front Office. Alternatively, we offer our web-based MY POS cash register as an add-on: transactions from MY SPA are settled directly and, depending on the country, may be signed for fiscal purposes. These sales and the used paymethod are also sent to the hotel system for information. Send Services and packages to MY SPA Services, which are included in the reservation, will be sent to MY SPA: No more mails or calls, the spa will be informed about any service, that is already booked on the guest's hotel invoice. Plan availabilities No need to know who can perform which treatment, is the person available, is the room free? When will the guest arrive? All this is handled comfortably in MY SPA. Guest IBE for direct booking Guest may book directly into the MY SPA calendar, follwing all additional rules you have set up. Spa Article Sales Manage your spa sale

or in a data centre.

It is built for groups and chains; we’ve used the best of the cloud to centralize management tasks and the experience of on-premises to focus staff attention on their guests. Infrasys is cloud based & offline capabilities – Cloud-based point-of-sale (POS) systems provide cost-effectiveness, scalability, and accessibility, allowing companies to handle operations centrally and obtain real-time data. Meanwhile, offline features enable vital tasks to be completed locally on devices, ensuring that operations continue even in the event of an internet interruption or disruptions. This is especially helpful when using a microservices design, as different services can be grown independently to satisfy different needs. Full-Service Solutions – Infrasys is a end-to-end solution, from mobile order-taking tablets with built in RFID, biometrics, chip and magnetic strip readers, to printers and dual screen devices for take-away locations Flexibility - Infrasys POS systems are often customizable to suit the specific needs of different types of hospitality businesses. This flexibility allows businesses to adapt the system to their unique workflows and requirements whilst being able to access the platform from any authorized device. 24/7 Support - For hotels with operations spanning different time zones or those providing services around the clock, having access to support at any hour is crucial. 24/7 support accommodates the diverse schedules of businesses in various locations. Simple, Powerful Workflows: Deliver five-star service without adding complexity to your daily operations. With comprehensive analytics, hotels gain insights into team performance, guest trends, and channel usage—turning conversations into opportunities for growth. apps.name: LIKE MAGIC
apps.title: LIKE MAGIC
apps.subtitle: Digital guest journey & hotel operations automation.
apps.about:
About LIKE MAGIC Proudly engineered in Switzerland, LIKE MAGIC delivers a unique solution for guests, employees and operators in just one browser-based, responsive web app. This means that guests book and check in online whenever they want, and unlock the door by using the same browser app that accompanies them along the whole stay with the hotel. The staff uses the same browser-based app to manage the guests' stay. What’s more, LIKE MAGIC acts like a platform so even the hotel software and door locks are connected. This allows LIKE MAGIC to monitor the stability of the system, which is a unique feature on the market. What drives us? Starting from scratch, we rethink things completely and make considerable changes to what working in the hospitality industry may look like tomorrow. Seamless, Fully Digital Guest Journey 📲 ✅ Contactless check-in & check-out—no waiting in line
✅ Digital room keys—access via smartphone
✅ AI-powered guest communication for instant responses Automate Operations & Reduce Costs 💰 ✅ Automates 80% of front desk and operational tasks
✅ Reduces staffing costs by streamlining check-in, payments, and service requests
✅ Minimizes manual errors with automated workflows Boost Revenue with Smart Upselling 💵 ✅ Personalized upselling at the right moment (early check-ins, upgrades, services)
✅ Automated payment processing for a frictionless experience
✅ Integrated booking engine to maximize direct bookings Solve Staff Shortages & Increase Efficiency ✅ Reduces dependency on front desk staff
✅ Automates service requests & housekeeping coordination
✅ Task management for optimal staff allocation

integration_features.name: Real time integration with Apaleo
integration_features.description: All changes made by a guest or employee through the digital guest journey of LIKE MAGIC are reflected in Apaleo in real time and vice versa. This allows your hotel to have a fully digital and automated check-in and check-out process.

integration_features.name: Digital room keys
integration_features.description: With LIKE MAGIC you are able to offer digital room keys to your guests. Additionally, through our self-serving kiosk guests can create physical key cards.

integration_features.name: Guest communication
integration_features.description: Through LIKE MAGIC you can communicate with your guests through their preferred communication channel like SMS, WhatsApp or email.

apps.name: ViCo
apps.title: ViCo
apps.subtitle: Your all in one digital platform! Enhance your guest experience while improving profitability!
apps.about: About ViCo ​​"Change before you have to" - Jack Welch (Former CEO GE) The hospitality industry is changing. Millennials are replacing older generations as the most important segment in our hotels and the use of technology is not only accepted but expected as a way of interaction between guests and the hotel. Millennials are the generation that travels the most in all history and they have unique tastes and preferences that we must satisfy to attract them to our hotels and earn their loyalty. This generation can be broadly summarized with two premises: personalized experiences over possessions and love for technology. Hotels that don’t adapt to these new preferences will be left behind. Luckily, technology is here to help! Providing an integral solution for hotels so they can seamlessly and cheaply adjust to this new trend was the main motivation when we created ViCO. ViCo stands for Virtual Concierge and it will become your new best employee and favorite tool! ViCo is a guest experience platform full of other related features that will improve your beloved guest's experience in every stage of their journey. A satisfied guest will spend more given the opportunity. Increase your revenue per available guest (RevPAG) with our upselling tool. Send the right offer to the right guest at the right time! We also built task management features on our platform that will not only make your staff more efficient but also reduce costs by eliminating certain tasks altogether. ViCo will also help you have a clear understanding of where you are achieving your service standards and where you have room for improvement. You will also be able to detect who is working properly and who might need some extra training. These are some of the features that are built into our platform. There are many more to talk about! Book a demo by clicking here and we can talk about how we can work together to improve your hotel performance. Increase Revenue Per Avalable Guest Send the right offer to the ri

integration_features.name: Online Check-in
integration_features.description: We spent a lot of time thinking about how we could make this process fast and easy for your guests while also getting to know your customer preferences and complying with all legal requirements.

integration_features.name: Real-time update
integration_features.description: Everything that happens in Apaleo or ViCo will be instantly reflected in both systems so it is always up to date.  Guests and staff actions and requests will also update instantly so everyone knows what's going on in real time.

integration_features.name: Individual or bulk messaging
integration_features.description: Keep your guests informed of any event taking place in your hotel or any unexpected issue with a few clicks on your back office. Also, message any particular guest directly with our direct messaging tool.

key_benefits.name: Improve Guest Satisfaction

key_benefits.name: Content Management System
key_benefits.description: Update all the information and services you offer in real-time. Everything is customizable and adaptable to your specific needs. Do it yourself and your guests will any delays!

key_benefits.name: We are flexible and open-minded!
key_benefits.description: Our goal is to improve your operations and bottom line. We are always open to suggestions and feature ideas! Talk to us!

apps.name: PAYJIM
apps.title: PAYJIM
apps.subtitle: Independent web-based self-checkout, tipping, invoice & payment solution for your apaleo system.
apps.about: About PAYJIM PAYJIM is a web-based SaaS Self-Checkout solution that streamlines payment and checkout processes for hotels, with the aim of digitising and automating the checkout process for all guests. Our focus is on providing a fast and seamless checkout process that is user-friendly and convenient. Through our streamlined checkout flow, guests can quickly and easily review their bill, split it into business and private invoices, select from multiple payment options, and complete the checkout process independently, without any further interaction at the reception. All the necessary information about a guest's stay is available through a simple QR scan within their hotel room. Our service is completely independent and compatible with any other workflows within the hotel. There are several advantages of using PAYJIM: We offer fast, secure, and independent payment and checkout services to guests at any time. Easy access to the payjim backoffice for managing and customising room QR-Codes. Our automated internal processes include direct integration with apaleo Pay, which works seamless with your accounting and avoids any additional transaction fees. payjim is completely web-based, guests do not need to download any app or register to use our services. In addition to our checkout service, we also offer an independent tipping solution for your team. Our PAYJIM tipping tool enables guests to tip the entire hotel, different departments, or even individual staff members. For more information, please visit our website at https://www.payjim.de/products. We offer a competitive pricing plan starting at 299 EUR per month for our BASIC suite, with a 30-day free trial. With our integration features, guests can make self-payments with the hotel's integrated payment provider and complete the Self-Checkout process independently after a full payment of the room is processed. Our payjim POS provides access to our backoffice with direct access to all QR codes for your rooms. Self-Checko

integration_features.name: Self payment with integrated payment provider
integration_features.description: We use your payment provider for processing payments. This will increase efficiency and security for your guests and avoid any additional transaction fees.

integration_features.name: Self-Checkout process
integration_features.description: Allow your guests to review their invoice, update billing addresses and make changes if needed and checkout their room. After a full payment of the room, the guest will be checked out and the folio will be  closed automatically. No further communication needed.

integration_features.name: payjim POS
integration_features.description:
Our backoffice is easily set-up and gives you direct access to unique QR Codes for all your rooms. 
The QR codes can be downloaded and customised for print-outs or used digitally as a PNG file.

apps.name: straiv
apps.title: straiv
apps.subtitle: Digital guest journey from the booking to the check-out.
apps.about:
About straiv straiv enables hotels to make the entire stay a digital experience for hotel guests. With the solutions by straiv, hotels accompany guests along the entire Guest Journey - from the first booking, through the stay, including digital check-in and check-out, to the next direct booking.
All hotel information, services and offers are available and bookable for every guest at any time and place. The solutions enables a quick and easy access via any device, without additional apps and tablets. Currently, more than 3.000 brand, individual and chain hotels in over 29 countries rely on this advanced solution. And also more than 200 apaleo installs happened already. Advantages: Offer active guest communication Automate internal work processes Expand upsell potential Improve hotel ratings Hotel guests benefit from a quick, easy and contactless service via their own smartphone No app download required Our solutions: Digital guest service / guest directory (web app) Self-service kiosks Mobile check-in and check-out / digital registration form (web app) Journey messaging (automated guest messaging) Mobile door opening Self Check-In/Out with integrated payment Hotel guests benefit from fast, easy and contactless service using their own smartphone or a self-service kiosk.This saves time and eliminates queues at check-in. No app download required! Automate internal work processes Use our automated mailing with e.g. booking confirmation, fill out registration card or check-in now available. The registration card will be filled out in advance by the guest and it is paperless.

integration_features.description: Email and SMS sending built-in functions increase communication with your guests.

apps.name: Alturos Guest Registration
apps.title: Alturos Guest Registration
apps.subtitle: Use the FRIVA Guest Registration integration to automatically transfer your guest data to Alturos.
apps.about: About Alturos Guest Registration We know only too well that bureaucratic work often takes up valuable time. When you enter your guests' data, this is first done in the hotel programme and then again in the registration programme. This doesn't have to be the case, because FRIVA Guest Registration can take care of this double data entry for you. With our solution, we have created a way to automatically extract the registration data from the hotel programme and transfer it to the registration programme of your municipality. Quick and uncomplicated. After successful transfer, you can conveniently print the registration form for your guests and create guest cards. Whether in print form or as a digital solution - FRIVA Guest Registration supports both functions (*depending on the registration programme and its functions). Time saving No more double data entry! Reduce your daily administrative tasks, invest the time you save and take care of the essential task of a hotelier - being a host. Automation You do not need to log in or carry out updates. With FRIVA guest registration, you use our fully automated service, which transfers your guest data from your PMS to the municipality programme. Quick and easy activation The connection of your hotel can be activated and enabled at any time for the integrations we have already developed. We will be happy to support you in querying the configuration data. Security & data protection Your registration-relevant guest data will be treated confidentially and in accordance with the GDPR guidelines. The data processing takes place exclusively in a member state of the EU.

apps.about: About AVS Gästemeldung by FRIVA We know only too well that bureaucratic work often takes up valuable time. When you enter your guests' data, this is first done in the hotel programme and then again in the registration programme. This doesn't have to be the case, because FRIVA Guest Registration can take care of this double data entry for you. With our solution, we have created a way to automatically extract the registration data from the hotel programme and transfer it to the registration programme of your municipality. Quick and uncomplicated. After successful transfer, you can conveniently print the registration form for your guests and create guest cards. Whether in print form or as a digital solution - FRIVA Guest Registration supports both functions (*depending on the registration programme and its functions). Time saving No more double data entry! Reduce your daily administrative tasks, invest the time you save and take care of the essential task of a hotelier - being a host. Automation You do not need to log in or carry out updates. With FRIVA guest registration, you use our fully automated service, which transfers your guest data from your PMS to the municipality programme. Quick and easy activation The connection of your hotel can be activated and enabled at any time for the integrations we have already developes. We will be happy to support you in querying the configuration data. Security & data protection Your registration-relevant guest data will be treated confidentially and in accordance with the GDPR guidelines. The data processing takes place exclusively in a member state of the EU.

apps.about: About umnify #hospitality With umnify #hospitality, hotels and serviced apartments can manage daily operations effortlessly. From guest communication to housekeeping and task management, everything stays organized in one place—making work easier for staff and ensuring a smooth stay for guests or tenants. Automate guest emails, keep profiles updated without manual effort, and assign tasks with clear responsibilities and deadlines. umnify’s smart apps simplify workflows, helping teams stay efficient and connected. Seamlessly integrated with apaleo, umnify keeps all data in sync, making operations more agile and responsive. Whether handling daily routines or optimizing long-term processes, umnify #hospitality adapts to your needs and scales with your business. With umnify #hospitality, hotels and serviced apartments can focus on what truly matters — delivering outstanding guest/tenant experiences. Everything in one place. Manage guest profiles, bookings, housekeeping, and more in a single system – no need to switch between different tools. More time for what matters. Automate workflows so your team can focus on delivering great service and making guests feel welcome. Works seamlessly with apaleo. umnify #hospitality syncs in real-time with apaleo, so your team always has up-to-date information. Save big, work smarter. Stop paying for extra subscriptions. With umnify #hospitality and apaleo, you get all the tools you need in one package.

apps.subtitle: 🦜 The AI Communication Hub for Hospitality
apps.about:
About chatlyn chatlyn is the AI Communication Hub for Hospitality, designed to revolutionize the way you connect with your guests. From the first inquiry to post-stay follow-ups, chatlyn provides the tools to automate guest communication, streamline operations, and deliver exceptional service that leaves a lasting impression. 🦜 Here’s how chatlyn transforms guest communication:
•	Effortless Automation: Say goodbye to repetitive tasks. chatlyn’s smart automation handles common guest inquiries, booking confirmations, and follow-ups, giving your team more time to focus on creating memorable experiences.
•	Enhanced Engagement: Optimize every interaction with chatlyn’s AI-powered tools, ensuring personalized, timely, and relevant communication at every touchpoint in the guest journey.
•	Seamless Multichannel Support: Whether it’s email, WhatsApp, SMS, or even OTA platforms like Booking.com and Airbnb, chatlyn brings all guest conversations into one intuitive platform, ensuring no message is ever missed.
•	Real-Time Language Translation: Communicate with guests in over 30 languages effortlessly, breaking down language barriers and creating a global hospitality experience. Why chatlyn Matters
Today, guests expect faster responses, personalized interactions, and seamless service. chatlyn helps you meet and exceed those expectations by reducing your team’s workload, enhancing guest satisfaction, and ultimately driving higher revenue through improved engagement and loyalty. From boutique hotels to global chains, chatlyn empowers hospitality businesses to provide next-generation service while staying efficient, connected, and guest-focused. Main features of chatlyn:
Omnichannel Inbox
AI Assistants (With tools like the AI Chatbot, AI Email Assistant, AI Review Assistant, AI Reservation Assistant, and a 24/7 AI Virtual Concierge)
WhatsApp Newsletters
Automation Studio (Guest Journey Builder)
WebChat Widget Chatbot powered by AI 🤖 Implement a chatbot powered with AI to answer you

apps.about: About ailean for hospitality Products like ChatGPT or hospitality chatbots, usually just provide information, but do not execute tasks. ailean changes this by being the first AI in the hospitality industry that can actually perform any task within a hotel's Property Management System. Communication ailean communicates with guests via WhatsApp around the clock in over 100 languages. Bookings and Reservations ailean has full access to PMS systems such as Apaleo, allowing her to handle all PMS-based tasks, from creating new reservations to exporting a PDF bill after checkout. Concierge ailean provides up-to-date information on local weather, restaurant ratings, opening hours, and event locations. Payment Guests can use ailean to make payments for new bookings or settle open balances during their stays, utilizing systems such as Adyen or Stripe.

apps.name: ExpectMe
apps.title: ExpectMe
apps.subtitle: Unique room selection platform, drawing inspiration from seat selection in theatres and aviation.
apps.about: About ExpectMe ExpectMe is a unique room selection platform that unlocks hidden revenue, elevates guest satisfaction, and supports staff efficiency. Drawing inspiration from personalized seat selection models in various industries, such as theatres and aviation, we have crafted a solution tailored to the unique requirements of the hospitality industry. We are all used to having the flexibility to pre-select seats on airlines. Our mission is to bring this possibility to hotel guests to support personalization and improve the guest experience. We have also seen that this can be a revenue driver, with a third of guests saying they would pay to be able to select their room rather than having it assigned by the hotel. Hotels now have a chance to drive incremental revenue not just by upselling higher room categories but also by monetizing room selection for the room category that was originally booked. Additionally, this is a great tool to reward guests, ensuring they book time and time again. Use room selection as part of your direct booking strategy, supporting a channel shift and reducing costs, as no OTA or party can offer this today. Our platform integrates seamlessly with Apaleo, ensuring real-time automation. This alleviates front desk staff from manual tasks, allowing them more time to interact with guests and offer a unique hospitality experience. With efficient onboarding and minimal setup disruption, we offer hospitality leaders an edge in this competitive market while providing an immediate impact on profitability. Empower your guests to personalize their stay by selecting and guaranteeing their own room and add-ons to make their stay extra special, while your hotel unlocks new revenue streams. Enjoy incremental revenue and profitability Monetize each individual room, with or without upgrade. Upsell specific products and services to drive ancillary revenue. Check the interactive dashboard for insights and analytics. Elevate guest experience Let your guests be

apps.name: MyBreakfast
apps.title: MyBreakfast
apps.subtitle: Say goodbye to printed lists with our digital breakfast solution for hotels and resorts.
apps.about: About MyBreakfast You know the problem! It's a stressful morning and all the guests want to have breakfast together. The guest list is probably still lying next to the spilled orange juice at the other end of the restaurant. With MyBreakfast, we solve a problem that has existed in the hotel industry for decades. We are putting an end to printed guest lists in the breakfast room. Not only are these printed lists a veritable Eldorado for data thieves and therefore a real security risk, they also don't fit in at all with the modern hotel landscape of today. With MyBreakfast, your guest data is always perfectly synchronized with your PMS. So you know at a glance which rooms have booked breakfast, can record walk-ins directly and welcome VIPs or birthday children with an extra smile. With our direct integration into Apaleo, your digital breakfast check-in is just a few minutes away, and with the free 30-day trial, you don't take any risks. Guest management & digital check-in Check in your guests quickly and stress-free via tablet, smartphone or PC. Working in a team & live synchronization Work on several devices simultaneously as a team and speed up your check-in service. Marking of VIPs, anniversaries & birthdays With just one glance, you can recognize VIPs and special events (e.g. birthdays, anniversaries) directly at check-in. Perfect privacy We protect the privacy of your guests by preventing unauthorized access to your guest data.

integration_features.name: Automatic import of daily guest data
integration_features.description: Enables the automatic import of current guest lists from Apaleo into MyBreakfast. This ensures that all breakfast reservations and guest data are up-to-date, synchronized and available to breakfast staff at all times, without manual effort.

integration_features.name: Comparison of rates and services
integration_features.description: Automatically checks whether breakfast is already included in the guest's booked rate plan. This information is displayed in MyBreakfast and helps hotel staff to keep an overview and avoid misunderstandings.

apps.name: DialogShift
apps.title: DialogShift
apps.subtitle: We are the German market leader in AI for guest communication in hospitality. One AI for your Hotel.
apps.about: About DialogShift Hi there! We are the German market leader in AI for guest communication in the hospitality industry. 🚀 Around 1000 hotels - from well-known hotel chains to family-run establishments with eight rooms - are supported by us in their guest communication. DialogShift supports hotels with the latest AI technology in guest communication. Our AI, equipped with hotel-specific knowledge, responds to guest inquiries in the hotel's tone 24/7 in over 100 languages via chat (website, WhatsApp, social media, etc.), email, or phone (coming soon). With our chatbot, email, review, and phone AI, you significantly increase productivity, ease the burden on your team, and boost direct bookings. This leaves more time for the most important thing: your guests. 💙 An AI solution for all your hotel communication needs! Our innovative company, based in the heart of Berlin, develops digital assistants powered by the latest technology: Generative AI. Up to five Large Language Models (LLMs) are at work, ranging from OpenAI to Mistral AI. This AI leverages hotel-specific knowledge, utilizing a specialized technology that reliably reads and extracts information from documents and websites. apps.about:
About HiJiffy With HiJiffy's Guest Communications Hub hoteliers boost direct bookings, increase upselling, automate processes and provide instant answers in 130+ languages to guests on their favourite social media, messaging apps and more. HiJiffy's Guest Communications Hub is powered by its proprietary AI - Aplysia OS - allowing hoteliers to increase revenue from direct bookings and upselling while automating repetitive tasks to reduce operating costs and mitigate staff shortages in the industry. In the pre-stay phase, HiJiffy's conversational AI ensures instant responses to frequently asked questions with automation rates above 85%, in more than 130 languages, and on different hotel communication channels - from a webchat on the website to Facebook or WhatsApp, from Instagram to Google My Business. The solution guides guests through the booking process wherever they are, 24/7, without the need for human interaction and with full integration with hotel management systems. During the stay, in addition to facilitating the digitalisation of processes such as check-in or check-out, HiJiffy's solution allows guests to obtain instant answers about the operation of the hotel and to request in a simple and contactless way any type of service that the hotel offers: reserving a restaurant table or a spa treatment. The solution also automates room service, as well as other types of requests related to maintenance, thanks to integrations with hotel management systems. In addition to upselling campaigns, using HiJiffy’s solution, hotels can also share satisfaction surveys and develop campaigns to promote reviews in an automated way during departure. Pioneer in Voice Assistants and GPT-4 in Hospitality

apps.name: SuitePad
apps.title: SuitePad
apps.subtitle: In-room tablets and digital guest communication.
apps.about: About SuitePad SuitePad is a Berlin-based company that provides digital tablet solutions for hotel rooms that act as a digitalized version of the guest directory with the added benefit of increasing communication between hotel staff and guests. Using the SuitePad tablets in their rooms, guests can book spa appointments, order roomservice, book activities, and much more—all with the click of a button. SuitePads open up channels of communication between hotel staff and guests that are not available with simple, paper-based guest directories. Using the SuitePad Backend, hotel staff can send push notifications directly to the SuitePads in guests’ rooms, creating a new and more interactive way of up-selling through the hotel’s outlets. In addition to their Digital Guest Directory, SuitePad tablets are also equipped with SuitePad Phone and SuitePad TV Control, allowing guests to make phone calls and control the hotel room TV through the SuitePad device in their room. SuitePad also has a “bring your own device” solution, called SuitePad BYOD, that allows guests to access their SuitePad interface through their personal mobile devices from any location. To help support front desk staff, SuitePad has created the SuitePad Lobby Screen that acts as an interactive information point for guests in the hotel lobby area. Most recently, SuitePad launched SuiteCast—a hotel room casting solution that enables guests to securely cast media content from their mobile devices to the TV in their hotel room. This solution is revolutionizing in-room entertainment for the hotel industry. SuitePad BYOD “bring your own device” solution, that allows guests to access their SuitePad interface through their personal mobile devices from any location SuiteCast a hotel room casting solution that enables guests to securely cast media content from their mobile devices to the TV in their hotel room.

apps.about: About RoomPal RoomPal is more than an app – it’s the gateway to a reimagined hospitality experience. In a world where personal service and efficiency must go hand in hand, RoomPal offers hoteliers and accommodation providers an innovative solution to seamlessly blend both. Leveraging advanced voice assistant technology based on Amazon Alexa, RoomPal transforms any hotel room into an interactive guest experience. From personalizing the guest experience to optimizing operational workflows, RoomPal is designed to redefine the interaction between guest and host. Guests can conveniently control room functions, request services, or get local recommendations through their voice, while hoteliers benefit from the rich data to continuously improve and personalize their services. Integrating RoomPal into their offerings allows hoteliers to enhance guest comfort and satisfaction, and also to gain valuable insights into preferences and behaviors. This information is priceless for crafting future offerings and fine-tuning marketing strategies. RoomPal also relieves staff by answering frequently asked questions directly through the digital concierge, allowing them more time to focus on personalized service tasks that a machine cannot (yet) perform. RoomPal’s real-time translation capabilities make communication barriers a thing of the past, ensuring a hospitable environment no matter where guests come from. Planned future features include intelligent upselling based on past guest behavior to maximize revenue per room without being intrusive. The flexibility of RoomPal ensures it grows with a hotel’s changing needs and requirements. With RoomPal, hoteliers step into a new era of guest service – an era where innovation, personalization, and efficiency set the stage, providing guests with a stay as unique as their voice. Save Costs RoomPal streamlines hotel operations by automating guest interactions and services through a voice assistant, leading to reduced staffing needs and operat
